title: krSNAnanda mukunda
sahitya:
krSNAnanda mukunda murArE krpAm kuru kEshava shaurE harE


anupallavi

 trSNArahita gOpIjana vallabha trivikrama nArAyaNa vAsudEva gOvinda padmanAbha


caraNam   yAdava vamsha payOnidhi candra yamaLArjunAdi bhanjanOpEndra mAdhava 
mAmava vinata vidhIndra mAyAtIta karuNAsAndra vEdanuta gaurI pAntarangAdi 
guruguha mOda muraLI nAda bhEda vinOda pankaja pAda mana prasIda shrIdhara
